text:
Hi there!

I am seeking a part-time Hubsppot Developer. The ideal candidate is an expert at developing custom landing pages and websites in HubSpot. Here are a few responsibilities:
• Develop landing pages
• Develop new webpages for an existing website
• Updating existing webpages on the website
• Develop effective, responsive designs
• Create custom modules for HubSpot CMS
• Assist with optimizing digital marketing assets (contact forms, A/B testing…etc.) 
Please message me if you are interested!
